main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, bluish-green ball of light that suddenly turned off in the Chicago, Illinois area in June 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a bright light that suddenly transformed into a bluish-green ball of light before disappearing.
The witness estimated the speed of the object to be around 200 mph.
The witness was unable to estimate the distance to the object, but described it as being similar in size to a basketball.
The witness had difficulty performing an angular size estimation experiment at the time of the sighting.
The witness reported seeing several large, round lights, possibly multiple objects like automobiles.
sighted object: a bright, bluish-green ball of light
